CustomField.inlineHelpText: Level of sociability or manageability with unfamiliar dogs. One dog is sufficient if response is green. If orange and there is no concerning history gather information on social walks.
CustomField.label: Dog Introductions

value.fullName: Appropriate: approach soft/fluid, pro-social, polite, can disengage, may be excitable but regulates
value.label: Appropriate: approach soft/fluid, pro-social, polite, can disengage, may be excitable but regulates

value.fullName: Disinterested: calm/relaxed, content sharing space, does not seek active engagement, not avoidant
value.label: Disinterested: calm/relaxed, content sharing space, does not seek active engagement, not avoidant

value.fullName: Focused/fixated: ambiguous social cues, may be overbearing/rude on introduction, tense, inappropriate but does not escalate
value.label: Focused/fixated: ambiguous social cues, may be overbearing/rude on introduction, tense, inappropriate but does not escalate

value.fullName: Frustrated/conflicted: may vocalise/intimidate other dog, show inappropriate behaviours, remains controllable
value.label: Frustrated/conflicted: may vocalise/intimidate other dog, show inappropriate behaviours, remains controllable

value.fullName: High arousal with repulsion: vocalises at any distance, hard to manage, introduction escalates quickly
value.label: High arousal with repulsion: vocalises at any distance, hard to manage, introduction escalates quickly
